name: Pew Pew (aenever)
description: Made for the  Fusion Wars - The Programming Menace game jam (Clickteam Fusion 2.5). I threw this together from an asteroids example posted by the 'Almighty Zen Taco'. I wanted to give my jam entry more attention, so I ditched this concept. However, It's still a great little game; I've included the .mfa files for those that are interested. Enjoy :)
